title: Nadia Bartel looks animated as she reads off her phone at the Lana Wilkinson shoe launch
text:
Her estranged husband Jimmy Bartel recently went public with his new relationship with girlfriend Lauren Mand.

And on Wednesday evening, Nadia Bartel looked like she had plenty to say about something as she read from her iPhone and chatted among guests at the launch of fashion stylist friend Lana Wilkinson's shoe range in Melbourne.

Clutching a drink in one hand, the 34-year-old blogger was spotted making dramatic facial expressions as she read aloud from her mobile.

She's got something to say about that! Nadia Bartel looked shocked as she read from her phone at at the launch of her fashion stylist friend Lana Wilkinson's shoe range in Melbourne on Wednesday night

At one point she looked shocked as she scrolled through down the screen.

It comes after Jimmy went public with new girlfriend Lauren Mand last week.

The retired star and the blonde looked decidedly downcast as they visited a discount pharmacy to purchase a pack of nappies - presumably for Henley, the 11-month-old son Jimmy shares with his estranged wife Nadia.

Nadia and Jimmy announced their split on August 15 - around two months after Nadia moved out of their marital home in Melbourne.

What's going on? Clutching a drink in one hand, the 34-year-old blogger was spotted making dramatic facial expressions as she read aloud from her mobile phone

The pair married in February 2014 in a lavish ceremony on the Bellarine Peninsula, and they share two sons, three-year-old Aston and Henley.

Meanwhile, Nadia documented her night out at the launch on Wednesday by taking to Instagram with a photo of herself posing with Lana, who has served as her stylist for many years.

'So proud of my beautiful Lana Wilkinson launching her shoe brand tonight. Anyone that knows Larns, knows how hard working she is, and that she will do anything for you,' Nadia captioned the post.

'So I couldn’t be happier and prouder for her kicking goals and achieving her dreams (and yes I wearing the ‘Nadia’ shoe here),' she added.

Looking good! Looking typically stylish, he mother-of-two showcased her slender frame in a white Dion Lee corset top with exposed boning details, and a pair of high-waisted palazzo trousers

So proud! Nadia documented her night out at the launch by taking to Instagram with a photo of herself posing with Lana, who has served as her stylist for many years

Looking typically stylish, he mother-of-two showcased her slender frame in a white Dion Lee corset top with exposed boning details, and a pair of high-waisted palazzo trousers.

The stunning blogger completed her ensemble with a pair of Lana's aptly-named 'Nadia' stilettos, which were named after her.

'So chuffed Lana Wilkinson named this shoe Nadia,' the blogger wrote on Instagram prior to the event, clearly flattered by the gesture.
description: Her estranged husband Jimmy Bartel recently went public with his new relationship with girlfriend Lauren Mand.
authors: Demeter Stamell For Daily Mail Australia
